message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $110. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $100?
